title: Testimony War
outcome: Following the amnesty, continuous ghost testimonies dominate the city. Emotional stories reveal lost lives, arbitrary erasures, and systemic abuse. Directorate factions counter by launching fear-driven campaigns, polarizing neighborhoods and igniting fierce public debate about who deserves rights and recognition. Halden’s old files leak, showing his unreported efforts to save many from erasure—his intervention recast as a failed act of redemption.

events.description: Daily broadcasts air personal testimony from ghosts, each account detailing abuses and injustices suffered under the BCI system, stirring public outrage and grief.
The Directorate launches a 'Ghosts Among Us' campaign, warning compliant citizens of alleged dangers from returnees, fueling neighborhood mistrust and heated assemblies.
Violent confrontations erupt in several districts, with citizens divided over whether to protect or exclude the ghosts. Lintz and Kova urgently mediate community dialogues.
A massive leak of Halden’s personal files reveals he intervened secretly to protect targeted individuals, recasting his death as an act of redemption amidst Council opposition.
A citywide forum is convened for both ghosts and established citizens to reconstruct a path forward, with Halden’s legacy now hotly debated as either salvation or betrayal.
